ygData.subject: Wizards are fun !
ygData.msgSnippet: I probably will get flamed for this for sure, but who cares. I made it all the way to lvl 12 as an erudite wizard.   I found that leveling was very slow indeed
ygData.messageBody:
I probably will get flamed for this for sure, but who cares.

I made it all the way to lvl 12 as an erudite wizard. I found that leveling
was very slow indeed and it was getting really boring camping with my groups
till the sun comes up. However, i was on a few days ago in the morning and my
regular group wasn't on. I shouted for about 30 min and no one wanted to join
up with me for bandit hunting. Out of boredom, i went down to the bandit camps
to see if i can find a group there(West karanas on top of Hill). I found this
group of 6 there camping the bandits so i just sat around shouting for groups
once again. But while those guys were fighting the bandits, i thought, hey might
as well try to see if i can kill one solo, if i can't, then they will probably
help me anyways. I attacked one bandit and killedh im in 3 shots with Shock of
Lightning. and WOW ! so much XP !!! so i just kept going. I got around 10-15
pp in 30 min and gained 1 bubble of xp. normall i gain 1 bubble in 6-8 hours of
playing. FINALLY ! i found how to have fun with my wizard and not be the lamer
that spent all his time trying to group and get shitty XP cuz of the split
between members !! who cares if they think i am a kill stealer, its not like
they can do anything about it HAHAHA. too bad for them that they wont group
with me. I also found some wizards are really stupid, the group of 6 i was
stealing from had a lvl 14 wizard and a lvl 11 wizard. and none of them could
stop me from stealing. its odd but true... ppl just don't think.. oh well.. i
hope you all try to just have fun and not give a shit what other ppl think for
once. then you might find why Varent say we are a balanced race, i personally
think we were made to give grief to others heehhe.. j/k I personally think we
should be changed to Erudite Magical Theives hehe..
